Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Bernie L. Hinton
Reviews.Content: This is biggest and best little camera, period! Point and shoot for clear, bright, in focus pictures. It also has a lot of big camera features if you are a more advanced photographer.This was a gift for my wife, who is NOT into all the bells and whistles, and she fell in love with it!

ProductInfo.Features:
4x Optical Zoom Lumix DC Vario Lens 5.5-22.0mm (33-132mm in 35mm equiv.) / 4x Digital Zoom Enhancement
Focusing Area Normal - Wide 50cm - infinity / Macro / Intelligent AUTO - Wide 5cm / Tele 50cm - infinity
AF Assist Lamp
ISO Sensitivity Auto / 80 / 100 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1000; High Sensitivity (ISO 1600-6400)
White Balance Auto / Daylight / Cloudy / Shade / Halogen / White Set
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS4 Black 8.1MP Digital Camera
